locations.title: Mexico
locations.description: Mexico is a country in the southern portion of North America. It is bordered to the north by the United States; to the south and west by the Pacific Ocean.

locations.title: Guatemala
locations.description: Guatemala is a country in Central America bordered by Mexico to the north and west, Belize and the Caribbean to the northeast.

locations.title: Belize
locations.description: Belize is a Caribbean country located on the northeastern coast of Central America. Belize is bordered on the northwest by Mexico, on the east by the Caribbean Sea, and on the south and west by Guatemala.

locations.title: Honduras
locations.description: Honduras is a country in Central America. The republic of Honduras is bordered to the west by Guatemala, to the southwest by El Salvador, to the southeast by Nicaragua, to the south by the Pacific Ocean at the Gulf of Fonseca, and to the north by the Gulf of Honduras, a large inlet of the Caribbean Sea.

locations.title: El Salvador
locations.description: El Salvador is the smallest and the most densely populated country in Central America. It is bordered on the northeast by Honduras, on the northwest by Guatemala.

locations.title: Nicaragua
locations.description: Nicaragua is the largest country in the Central American isthmus, bordered by Honduras to the northwest, the Caribbean to the east, Costa Rica to the south, and the Pacific Ocean to the southwest.

locations.title: Costa Rica
locations.description: Costa Rica is a country in Central America, bordered by Nicaragua to the north, the Caribbean Sea to the northeast, Panama to the southeast, the Pacific Ocean to the southwest, and Ecuador to the south of Cocos Island.

locations.title: Panama
locations.description: Panama is a transcontinental country in Central America and South America, bordered by Costa Rica to the west, Colombia to the southeast.

locations.title: Colombia
locations.description: Columbia is a country largely situated in the north of South America, with land and territories in North America. Colombia is bounded on the north by the Caribbean Sea.

locations.title: Peru
locations.description: Peru is a country in western South America. It is bordered in the north by Ecuador and Colombia, in the east by Brazil, in the southeast by Bolivia, in the south by Chile, and in the west by the Pacific Ocean.

locations.title: Ecuador
locations.description: Ecuador is a country in northwestern South America, bordered by Colombia on the north, Peru on the east and south, and the Pacific Ocean on the west.

locations.title: Venezuela
locations.description: Venezuela is a country on the northern coast of South America, consisting of a continental landmass and many small islands and islets in the Caribbean Sea.

locations.title: Guyana
locations.description: Guyana is a country on the northern mainland of South America. It is the only English speaking country in South America, and is culturally considered part of the Anglophone-Caribbean sphere.

locations.title: Suriname
locations.description: Suriname is a country on the northeastern Atlantic coast of South America. It is bordered by the Atlantic Ocean to the north.

locations.title: French Guiana
locations.description: French Guiana is an overseas department and region of the French Republic on the northern Atlantic coast of South America in the Guianas.

locations.title: Brazil
locations.description: Brazil is the largest country in both South America and Latin America. At 8.5 million square kilometers (3.2 million square miles) and with over 211 million people, Brazil is the world's fifth-largest country by area and the sixth most populous.

locations.title: Bolivia
locations.description: Bolivia is a landlocked country located in western-central South America. The capital is Sucre, while the seat of government and financial center is located in La Paz.

locations.title: Paraguay
locations.description: Paraguay is a country in South America. It is bordered by Argentina to the south and southwest, Brazil to the east and northeast, and Bolivia to the northwest.

locations.title: Argentina
locations.description: Argentina is a country located mostly in the southern half of South America. Sharing the bulk of the Southern Cone with Chile to the west.

locations.title: Argentina
locations.description: Argentina is a country located mostly in the southern half of South America. Sharing the bulk of the Southern Cone with Chile to the west.

locations.title: Cuba
locations.description: Cuba is a country comprising the island of Cuba as well as Isla de la Juventud and several minor archipelagos. Cuba is located in the northern Caribbean where the Caribbean Sea, Gulf of Mexico and Atlantic Ocean meet.

locations.title: Jamaica
locations.description: Jamaica is an island country situated in the Caribbean Sea. Spanning 10,990 square kilometres (4,240 sq mi) in area, it is the third-largest island of the Greater Antilles and the Caribbean.

locations.title: Haiti
locations.description: Haiti is a country located on the island of Hispaniola in the Greater Antilles archipelago of the Caribbean Sea, to the east of Cuba and Jamaica and south of The Bahamas and the Turks and Caicos Islands.

locations.title: Dominican Republic
locations.description: Dominican Republic is a country located on the island of Hispaniola in the Greater Antilles archipelago of the Caribbean region.

locations.title: Puerto Rico
locations.description: Puerto Rico is an unincorporated territory of the United States located in the northeast Caribbean Sea, approximately 1,000 miles (1,600 km) southeast of Miami, Florida.

locations.title: The Bahamas
locations.description: The Bahamas is a country within the Lucayan Archipelago in the West Indies.

locations.title: Chile
locations.description: Chile is a South American country occupying a long, narrow strip of land between the Andes to the east and the Pacific Ocean to the west.

locations.title: Uruguay
locations.description: Uruguay is a country in the southeastern region of South America. It borders Argentina to its west and Brazil to its north and east.

locations.title: Turks and Caicos
locations.description: Turks and Caicos consists of the larger Caicos Islands and smaller Turks Islands, two groups of tropical islands in the Lucayan Archipelago of the Atlantic Ocean and northern West Indies.
